decisions_made: Build all packages instead of core only for comprehensive testing
Issue #1: TypeScript types are actually CORRECT (curried signature matches runtime)
Issue #2: Runtime code calls useConfig() which will fail if RootConfigContext is undefined
Upgraded Next.js to 16.1.2 with pnpm overrides to force all packages to use same version
Disabled Turbopack due to missing server-external-packages.json bug in Next.js 16.1.2
Server successfully started with Webpack - Admin UI loads without context errors!
patterns_discovered: Defensive null checks for React Context prevent RSC rendering crashes
React 'use()' hook can return undefined in Next.js 16 SSR lifecycle
Curried route handlers are the correct pattern for Next.js dynamic routes
Non-null assertions (!) should be replaced with explicit error handling for better DX
Code review caught critical runtime safety issues before deployment
